map.long:
`maps...` is a sequence of zero or more letters separated by spaces:
    - t: Tanglewood
    - e: Edgefield
    - w: Willow
    - r: Ridgeview
    - g: Grafton
    - b: Bleasdale
    - h: Brownstone Highscool
    - p: Prison
    - a: Asylum
map.brief: choose a random map between all of them, or only those indicated in `maps...`

challenge.long:
If you don't specify CHALLENGE_NAME, the command will give you the name of a random challenge. Possible challenges:
    - photo: Photo challenge (no wheel to spin)
    - traits: Trait challenge (From https://www.dposofficial.com/phasmophobiatraitschallenge.html)
    - traits-bonus: Bonus wheel of the trait challenge
challenge.brief: pick a random challenge or turn the wheel of a specific challenge

clues.long:
Valid clues:
    - emf or emf5
    - book or writing or ghostwriting
    - fingerprints or fingers
    - spirit or spiritbox
    - orbs or ghostorbs
    - freezing or temps
    - dots
clues.brief: Show which ghosts are possible with those clues and which evidence is lacking
